release.notes:
Red & green splatter vinyl, housed in a limited gold foil and embossed jacket. Includes a white, die-cut inner sleeve lined with clear plastic.

F-8431 appears on the spine, while 8431 appears on the front cover.
CR04310 appears on the "Craft Recording Gold Foil Edition" sticker, while CR04527 appears on the "Limited edition vinyl with red & green splatter" sticker.

"Disc Made in Poland" appears on a sticker on the shrink wrap.

Tracks A1 to B2, B4 published by Shifty-Felfar Music
Track B6 published by Edwin H. Morris, Inc.

[Rear cover]
Mastering (1988)-George Horn
(Fantasy Studios, Berkeley)

[Rear cover and labels]
℗ 2012 & © 1972 Craft Recordings. Manufactured and distributed by Concord, 10 Lea Avenue, Suite 300, Nashville, TN, 37210.
Made in U.S.A.

[Front cover]
Peanuts © 1950, 1952, United Feature Syndicates, Inc.
